lead_paragraph: Officials have assailed BP’s response, but the federal government also had opportunities to move more quickly and did not do so. President Obama will visit the region on Sunday.
snippet: Officials have assailed BP’s response, but the federal government also had opportunities to move more quickly and did not do so. President Obama will visit the region on Sunday.

headline.main: U.S. Missed Chances to Act on Oil Spill
headline.print_headline: U.S. Missed Chances to Act on Oil Spill

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and ERIC LIPTON
